sentences.sContent: Many of the rugs are too garish for my taste.
sentences.sCn: 许多地毯色彩太花哨，不合我的口味。

synos.tran: 炫耀的；过分装饰的；过分鲜艳的

remMethod.val: gar(花) + ish → 花哨的 → 俗丽的； 注意不要和garnish(v. 装饰)相混

words.tran: 为增加色香味而添加的配菜；装饰品

trans.tranCn: 俗丽的， 过于艳丽的
trans.tranOther: very brightly coloured in a way that is unpleasant to look at
